import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import CustomerDataService from '../services/CustomerDataService'; function AddCustomer(props) { const [customerName, setCustomerName] = useState(""); const [mobno, setMobno] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [pin, setPin] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [stateId, setStateId] = useState(""); const [pan, setPan] = useState(""); const [totalOutBal, setTotalOutBal] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { setID(localStorage.getItem('ID')) setCustomerName(localStorage.getItem('First Name')); setLastName(localStorage.getItem('Last Name')); setCheckbox(localStorage.getItem('Checkbox Value')); }, []); const saveCustomer = () => { var data = { customerName : customerName, mobno : mobno, address : address, city : city, pin : pin, email : email, stateId : stateId, pan : pan, totalOutBal : totalOutBal, }; CustomerDataService.create(data) .then(response => { console.log(response.data); }) .catch(e => { console.log(e); }); }; return ( <>
